title: Why it’s critical to move beyond overly aggregated machine-learning metrics
summary: The article emphasizes the importance of moving beyond overly aggregated machine-learning metrics, which often mask nuanced performance variations across different data segments. title: CISA says critical VMware RCE flaw now actively exploited
summary: The U.S. Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency (CISA) has identified active exploitation of a critical remote code execution (RCE) vulnerability in VMware's software. This flaw poses significant security risks, allowing attackers to execute arbitrary code on unpatched systems without user interaction. The urgency of the situation has prompted CISA to urge organizations to prioritize upgrading their VMware environments and apply patches immediately to mitigate potential threats. This exploitation highlights the importance of maintaining up-to-date systems to safeguard against evolving cybersecurity risks.
